content.question: The views expressed by Chairman Gonzalo in the passage are best explained in the context of which of the following historical circumstances of the late twentieth century?

choices.label: The expansion of the military-industrial complex in Latin American states
The rise of movements that challenged colonial rule in Latin America
The rise of separatist movements that demanded regional autonomy
The intensification of political conflicts between state and nonstate entities

content.answer: The intensification of political conflicts between state and nonstate entities

topic.text: 8.7: Global Resistance to Established Power Structures after 1900
